name: Train'spection
description:
Synopsis

Steadman Parsons, a detective, just begun his vacation and during his return to Liverpool he must pick up a job sooner than expected.

A murder happened in the same wagon and the train won't move until the murderer is found.

You must interrogate and find clues to arrest the culprit.

Dev Team Developpers

Thibaud Chevillard, Enzo Benedetti, Thomas Boulanger

Artists

Niels Bouly, Pauline Spadari, Manon Péchiné, Louna Raoux

Project Description

This game was made in 1 week for a school project.

The constraints were to make a Point'n Click with 1 animated character, an inventory, 3 scenes, and objects and PNJs.
